error.signature: Error: fetch failed with 'no-store' / Dynamic server usage: force-dynamic

verdict.summary: fetch with cache: 'no-store' makes the route dynamic, conflicting with static generation.

dead_ends.action: Remove cache: 'no-store' to make it static
dead_ends.why_fails: May serve stale data if the API data changes frequently

dead_ends.action: Set force-static on the route segment
dead_ends.why_fails: Force-static will fail if the page truly needs dynamic data

workarounds.action: Use revalidate instead of no-store for ISR: fetch(url, { next: { revalidate: 60 } })
If truly dynamic, set export const dynamic = 'force-dynamic' in the page
Understand the trade-off: static = fast/cached, dynamic = fresh/slower

frequently_confused_with.distinction: 'Error' is a data_error error while 'Error' has a different failure mode despite similar symptoms. Check error message details to differentiate.
